altText: Flyer for a The Modes show on March 1st, 2025. The poster shows Aziza on the left, under a red light, and Tom on the right, under a blue light. Tickets are $20.

Flyer for a The Modes show on March 27, 2025 at 9 pm (doors open at 8 pm). The poster shows the full live band playing in a dark venue, with a disco ball on top of them. A text on the top-left corner reads Brought to You by The Modes.
